Package SteppingStones

Class Ingredient

  • java.lang.Object
    • SteppingStones.Ingredient
  • public class Ingredient
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents an ingredient, with a name, amount, unit of measurement, and number of calories.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Ingredient()
      Default constructor that initializes the ingredient with default values.
      Ingredient​(java.lang.String ingredientName, double ingredientAmount, java.lang.String unitMeasurement, double numberOfCalories)
      Constructor that initializes the ingredient with the provided values.

      • setIngredientName

        public void setIngredientName​(java.lang.String ingredientName)
        Sets the name of the ingredient. If the name is null, empty, or contains non-alphabetical characters, an error message is printed.
        Parameters:
        ingredientName - the new name of the ingredient

      • setIngredientAmount

        public void setIngredientAmount​(double ingredientAmount)
        Sets the amount of the ingredient. If the amount is less than 0, an error message is printed.
        Parameters:
        ingredientAmount - the new amount of the ingredient

      • setUnitMeasurement

        public void setUnitMeasurement​(java.lang.String unitMeasurement)
        Sets the unit of measurement for the ingredient. If the unit of measurement is null, empty, or contains non-alphabetical characters, an error message is printed.
        Parameters:
        unitMeasurement - the new unit of measurement

      • setNumberOfCalories

        public void setNumberOfCalories​(double numberOfCalories)
        Sets the number of calories in the ingredient. If the number of calories is less than 0, an error message is printed.
        Parameters:
        numberOfCalories - the new number of calories
